overview: In 1928, in a small PA town, a satanic cult is killed off and their house burnt down. The film picks up in the camp they ran, 90 years later. With the ruins nearby and tales of disappearances and odd happenings, stories seem to haunt Camp Hideaway. Monsters, killers, even aliens... are the owner, townspeople, or the cult's descendents killing off the campers?  Or is it possible there's truth to these horrific tales? As the body count continues , Dana (Tina Krause) hopes to find out while saving her friends.
title: Camp Hideaway Massacre
